result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty plea entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is set for 03-15-2016 @ 9:00 a.m.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.
Ann Larson, public defender.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 02-10-16 at 1:30 p.m.  
Minutes.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody on warrant and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of falsely present noncontrolled substance (2nd+).  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 02-01-16 at 2:30 p.m., Br. 2.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions defendant must report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release, defendnat is not to possess any controlled substances unless prescribed to him, taken as prescribed, and defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs.  Bail furnished and defendant is remanded to the county jail on a probation hold.
Warrant returned with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.
RE:  Deliver imitation controlled substance - 2nd or subsequent offense, on 07-08-15.
